text: The Tenant () is a 1976 French horror thriller movie directed by Roman Polanski (who also stars) and is based on the 1964 novel of the same name by Roland Topor. It stars Isabelle Adjani, Melvyn Douglas, Jo Van Fleet, Bernard Fresson, Lila Kedrova, Claude Dauphin, Shelley Winters and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1976 horror movies Category:1976 thriller movies Category:1970s horror thriller movies Category:1976 LGBT movies Category:French horror movies Category:French thriller movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Roman Polanski Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Tenant
